events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund case due to the customer's request for money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to request a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number: 123456789. I have attached a photo showing that the item is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email.
Thank you for your prompt response and for arranging the refund so quickly.
The refund has been processed successfully and should appear on your payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and to see if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I have received the refund today. Thank you for your excellent support throughout this process.
We are glad to hear your refund was received. Closing this support case now, feel free to reach out anytime.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our services.
